about_the_game:
In god pill you play as a ragdoll dreg who uses military-grade fingerless gloves to escape his mortal coil. This fast paced, action packed, arcade-inspired beat 'em up/on-rails shooter mashup sees the player fighting against a myriad of grotesque creatures including homunculi, aliens, even cops! Explore unique environments filled to the brim with computer animated graphics that move back and forth. Become god pilled and achieve ascendance by climbing the leaderboards!

This game is gonna knock your socks off! It is fun and nice and made just for YOU

FEATURES

  • FOUR unique weapons (hand poses) for every possible encounter.
  • COMBOS that are interchangeable between weapons.
  • HUNDREDS of enemies on screen at once.
  • OVER FOUR environments to explore. (five)
  • BEUTIFUL artwork made by the best artists to ever live.
  • MUSIC i found on the internet.
  • DEHUMANIZE yourself and face to bloodshed! Dehuman



This will be you while playing god pill. Not trolling- this could be you.
